questiontext.text:
Exercise Øving

In triangle \(OAB\) the point \(P\) divides \(AB\) internally in the ratio \(m:n\). I trekanten \(OAB\) deles linjen \(AB\) opp i forhold til \(m:n\) av punktet \(P\).

If \(\overrightarrow{OA} = \underline{a}\) and \(\overrightarrow{OB} = \underline{b}\), then find an expression for \(\overrightarrow{OP}\) in terms of \(\underline{a}\) and \(\underline{b}\). Hvis \(\overrightarrow{OA} = \underline{a}\) og \(\overrightarrow{OB} = \underline{b}\), finn da et uttrykk for \(\overrightarrow{OP}\) gitt ved \(\underline{a}\) og \(\underline{b}\).

You might find it helpful to draw a diagram showing this triangle. Det kan være nyttig å tegne et diagram som viser denne trekanten.

\(\overrightarrow{OP} = \) [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]] [[feedback:prt1]]

generalfeedback.text:
The figure below shows the triangle with the vector \(\overrightarrow{OP}\) marked with a dotted line within. Figuren under viser trekanten med vektoren \(\overrightarrow{OP}\) markert med en stiplet linje innenfor.

From the diagram we can see \(\overrightarrow{OP} = \overrightarrow{OA} + \overrightarrow{AP}\).  We are told \(\overrightarrow{OA} = \underline{a}\) and so we need to find \(\overrightarrow{AP}\).  We know that \(P\) divides \(\overrightarrow{AB}\) in the ratio \(m:n\) so \[\overrightarrow{AP} = \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\overrightarrow{AB}\right),\] as \[\overrightarrow{AB} = \underline{b} - \underline{a}\] we find \[\overrightarrow{AP} = \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\underline{b} - \underline{a}\right)\] and therefore, \[\overrightarrow{OP} = \underline{a} + \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\underline{b} - \underline{a}\right).\] Fra diagrammet kan vi se at \(\overrightarrow{OP} = \overrightarrow{OA} + \overrightarrow{AP}\).  Vi har blitt fortalt at \(\overrightarrow{OA} = \underline{a}\) så vi må finne \(\overrightarrow{AP}\).  Vi vet at \(P\) deler \(\overrightarrow{AB}\) i forholdet \(m:n\) så \[\overrightarrow{AP} = \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\overrightarrow{AB}\right),\] siden \[\overrightarrow{AB} = \underline{b} - \underline{a}\] finner vi \[\overrightarrow{AP} = \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\underline{b} - \underline{a}\right)\] og dermed er, \[\overrightarrow{OP} = \underline{a} + \frac{m}{m+n}\left(\underline{b} - \underline{a}\right).\]

Note: You can arrive at an equivalent expression by starting from \(\overrightarrow{OP} = \overrightarrow{OB} + \overrightarrow{BP}\). Merk: Du kan komme til et ekvivalent uttrykk ved å starte fra \(\overrightarrow{OP} = \overrightarrow{OB} + \overrightarrow{BP}\).

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

truefeedback.text: Almost correct, the question asks for \(\overrightarrow{OP}\) which is the vector pointing from \(O\) to \(P\).  Check that your answer points in this direction.
Almost correct, check the direction of the vector \(\overrightarrow{AB}\), it looks like you may have used \(\overrightarrow{BA}\) instead.
Almost correct, check the direction of the vector \(\overrightarrow{BA}\), it looks like you may have used \(\overrightarrow{AB}\).
